# imageToTextPadding

**Instance Property**

The padding between the image and text.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageToTextPadding: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value only applies when there’s both an image and text.

## Customizing layout

- **axesPreservingSuperviewLayoutMargins**: A Boolean value that determines whether the content view preserves the layout margins that it inherits from its superview on the horizontal or vertical axes.
- **directionalLayoutMargins**: The margins between the content and the edges of the content view.
- **prefersSideBySideTextAndSecondaryText**: A Boolean value that determines whether the configuration positions the text and secondary text side by side.
- **textToSecondaryTextHorizontalPadding**: The minimum horizontal padding between the text and secondary text.
- **textToSecondaryTextVerticalPadding**: The vertical padding between the text and secondary text.
